response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking out the prawn from the fridge. The prawn is now in the robot's inventory. The next step is to take out the butter from the fridge. However, the butter is not in the fridge but on the plate which is on the countertop. So, the robot needs to move to the countertop and take the butter.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take out the prawn from the fridge
(4) Move to the countertop
(5) Take the butter from the plate on the countertop
(6) Move to the stove
(7) Cook the prawn
(8) Move to the plate
(9) Place the cooked prawn on the plate
(10) Place the butter on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 4: Move to the countertop
    countertop = registry(env,"countertop_tpuwys_6")
    MoveBot(env, robot, countertop, camera)
    donothing(env)
